name: Fruits Mura no Doubutsu Tachi
storyline: You build up your relationship with a group of friends who've come from across the seas to Fruits Village. To strengthen your relationship, you'll have to win at the over forty mini games included in the game. Friends who've gotten really fond of you will build a home, open stores and help make Fruits Village a fun place for all! How fun can you make Fruits Village before the start of the big festival? All in all, more than 40 mini-games are included.
summary: Fruits Mura no Doubutsu Tachi is a cutesy collection of mini-games and events for one player. You build up your relationship with a group of friends who've come from across the seas to Fruits Village.
